summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json, which is a metadata/tracking file. No actual implementation files were added or modified. All five requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-5) remain unimplemented, as none of the required files (manifest.json, sw.js, updated index.html, icon files, install prompt component) appear in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a complete Web App Manifest (manifest.json) in frontend/public with all required fields and icon sizes
missing_requirements.reason: No manifest.json file was added in the diff. The diff only updates project_state.json to mark the requirement as pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Register a service worker (sw.js) in frontend/public with cache-first and network-first strategies
missing_requirements.reason: No sw.js file was added and no registration code was added to main.tsx or index.html.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add all required PWA meta tags to frontend/index.html
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html was not modified in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate PWA app icons (192x192 and 512x512 minimum) in frontend/public/icons
missing_requirements.reason: No icon files were added to frontend/public/icons or anywhere else in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a dismissible 'Add to Home Screen' install prompt banner in the app UI
missing_requirements.reason: No UI component or hook implementing the install prompt banner was added or modified.
